website_summaries.verdict: A cute, quality line of swimsuits that will last through many trips to the beach.
pros: Comes in sizes from newborn to 2T in 7 different designs
Features snaps at the bottom of the suit to make diaper changes quick and easy
cons: The suits seem to run a little small in size

customer_reviews.title: Love On Baby!
customer_reviews.text: I love, love this swimsuit!! The only reason I didn't give it a 5 star is because 6-12 month range clothes drive me crazy for babies. There's a huge difference between a 6 month old and a one year old!! My chunkalicious baby (weighs 16 pounds) isn't quite 6 months but I wanted to get something she could wear for awhile...as you can see it fits perfectly which is great, but probably won't get as many months out of it as is hoped. Also glad I didn't get the 3-6 month size. Already had compliments on cuteness and will buy again in bigger sizes.
customer_reviews.author: Alli

customer_reviews.title: Excellent swim suit for my ginger baby
customer_reviews.text: Excellent swim suit for my ginger baby! I wanted something that zipped up the back because it is SO HARD to get a wet rashguard around a big ol' baby head, and I love the snaps at the bottom which make diaper changes during pool/beach days super easy. Excellent suit and will be buying another one next summer!
customer_reviews.author: Heidi

customer_reviews.title: Run Small
customer_reviews.text: I loved the swim suit and the quality. But they run a little small. I bought a 6-12 month and it was too little for my 9 month old. My baby is not very big she is only in the 45th percentile so I was surprised that this did not fit. I ordered the 12-18 month and it fit perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Nicky Brown

customer_reviews.title: Great swimsuit, but be sure to size up
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 1 year-old daughter. Usually, 24 month size clothes are slightly large on her, but fit comfortably. After reading some reviews on here, I decided to size up even from that, so I purchased a 2T. I'm glad I did because it fits perfectly! It is a super cute design and seems to be well made. The seams are strong, yet stretch well with all the running and playing she does. I really like that this has long sleeves as it will protect from the sun much better than her last one. The zipper on the back makes it really easy to get it off when its wet. So far, we love this!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Stepanovs

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE this swimsuit
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this swimsuit. My baby is about 16lbs and for me it fits perfectly. She has some room to grow in it, but it is not huge on her. I think we will make it through the summer (unless she has a crazy growth spurt). Do not hesitate to buy this! I know the sizing is off in the reviews, I suggest buying one and if it does not fit, return it for another size. The quality is great and you really cannot go wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Adorable swimsuit!
customer_reviews.text: This swimsuit is adorable! My only complaint is that it runs a little small. Initially I purchased the 6-12 month size and it fit my little girl to a T. I didn’t foresee this swimsuit lasting through the summer so I exchanged it for a 12-18 month size. My baby girl is 16 lbs, 26 in long and the 12–18 month size fits her very well. The arms are a little long but at least she’ll continue to grow into it instead of out of it. Giving it 4 stars only due to the fit, otherwise it’s a beautiful print for a swimsuit. Can’t wait to show her off in it!
customer_reviews.author: Jill S.

customer_reviews.title: A bit Spendy but very high quality.
customer_reviews.text: This fit my daughter PERFECTLY and the quality is exceptional. All the seams are surged and the fabric is very thick and not so stretchy/flimsy as other swimsuits I have purchased for my girls. Many children's swimsuits, once wet, stretch out and and the leg/neck openings get loose and open...sometimes riding up on their little bottoms etc...this swimsuit did not do that and I would recommend this brand to other mothers and would purchase it again myself.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda C.

customer_reviews.title: Favorite swimsuit so far for our babe
customer_reviews.text: We have ordered two of these, as we outgrew the first one! We’ve tried several other suits and this is by far my favorite. I LOVE these. Our 9 month old is obsessed with swimming and these are great quality, have held up to the pool chlorine, lake water, etc. perfect because we only have to sunscreen her face and legs and not wrestle her to do her arms! I will continue buying these as long as she fits in them. For reference - She is 23 lbs, 28 inches tall and is in 18-24 month (flamingo) suit. The floral one lasted us 2 months before she outgrew it. They fit snug, but she is obviously a big kid lol.
customer_reviews.author: Casey B.

customer_reviews.title: Recommend sizing up
customer_reviews.text: Super cute, high quality swim suit! I love it! I ordered the 12-18 month size for my massive 4 month old (she’s just over 20lbs and about 26.5”). I expected this size to be a little big so she’d have room to grow this summer, but it’s already pretty much a perfect fit lol. So hopefully she slows down a bit. But I will buy the next size when she outgrows this one!
customer_reviews.author: Hannah B.

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely adorable!
customer_reviews.text: We took our 6 month old to Florida and were pretty nervous about the strength of the sun on her delicate baby skin so we opted for a long sleeve rufflebutt swimsuit. My daughter is in the 80% for height and this swimsuit sized 6-12 fit great! The snaps on the bottom made it super easy to switch from her regular diaper to swim diaper once we got to the pool. Not to mention it was so so cute! Can't wait to use this swimsuit all summer long!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: cute but isn't long lasting.
customer_reviews.text: We loved this swimsuit for our almost 15 year old. I bought it back in the beginning of April but only really started using it recently. The fit is pretty good. I bought a 12-18, she is about 22 lbs. We don't tend to go on the lower side with chlorine in our pool and I hand wash and hang dry. So its been about 3 months of us owning it and about a month and a half of 2-3 times a week use. The elastic in the suit is already breaking down(see pic). I'm quite disappointed as this is a more expensive suit for a baby.
customer_reviews.author: Audrey L.

customer_reviews.title: Cute suit, order a size or two larger.
customer_reviews.text: It’s too cold to swim just yet here, but I love this suit already. My daughter is 5 months old, 24”, and 15lbs, I got the 12-18 month old size based on other reviews to order a size up. She has quite a bit of room to grow without it being too big on her. The construction is nice and I’m sure it will be a great sun blocker once we get to get out and swim.
customer_reviews.author: Misfitsgirl81

customer_reviews.title: Pretty, but zipper isn’t covered and leaves marks on baby’s neck
customer_reviews.text: The suit itself is beautiful - amazing material, well made, and super cute. Sadly, the zipper on the back isn’t covered and so it digs into my baby’s neck the entire time she’s swimming. I’ve tried it twice and it left a red mark each time. I’m hoping when she gets a little taller that will help, but for now it’s just not really a wearable suit.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Hendrickson

customer_reviews.title: Broken snaps after second use. — UPDATE: Company sent new suit and I’ve had 0 issues.
customer_reviews.text: The snaps broke after my daughter wore this swim suit twice. She is only 8 months old so she wasn’t doing any crazy jumps in a pool. I’m so disappointed as it took a lot financially for me to finally be able to afford this swim suit. I had to take my daughter out in a alternative suit that didn’t have long sleeves which was also disappointing considering we are dealing with the Texas sun. I will be returning as soon as my printer is able to print the return label. UPDATE — company sent me another swim suit at no cost. I haven’t had any issues with the new bathing suit.
customer_reviews.author: Myler Pickrel

customer_reviews.title: Sweet little colorful suit, great fit!
customer_reviews.text: We ordered the rainbow colored one size 2t for our 26-month old daughter and it fits great. She’s average size and it’s a perfect fit. The colors are beautiful and the ruffles are a sweet little detail. It’s easy to get on and off even when wet. She wears it with a swim diaper. Im not sure but it may be a little uncomfortable without a diaper because of the snaps. Our daughter even loves the suit—she says “ooh look at all the colors” whenever we put it on :) sun protection is great too.
customer_reviews.author: D and K

customer_reviews.title: Buy this swimsuit. Don't think about it. Just buy it.
customer_reviews.text: Oh soooooooo cute! And the fabric dries a lot quicker than the other One-Piece Swimsuits we have. Perfect sizing and such a cute little ruffle butt! I only wish they had this one in the larger sizes (we need 12-18)! I ended up getting a different pattern because the 6-12 month fit our baby girl so perfectly she'd be out of it in a few weeks! Great sun protection for our fair-skinned little babe.
customer_reviews.author: Errrin

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful! Well made!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE. We got this suit in 3t. For reference, My daughter has recently moved into 3t clothing but still fits into 2t from places like old navy. She’s 4t in Carter’s pajamas. I was worried the 3t might be a little too big but it fits nicely, a little loose but I assume she will grow by the end of the summer. I also debated 2t but remembered the first ruffle butts swimsuit I got her seemed slightly small. I’m happy with 3t. 2t would have been too tight. Great material and nicely made too. I would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: W. Krause

customer_reviews.title: Great bathing suit. Daughter loves it. Many compliments!
customer_reviews.text: I bought the 3T for my daughter who is two years old and who is almost 3ft tall and weighs about 29lbs. It fits her with just enough to grow into. Not too loose. Obviously in the picture it’s wet and sticking to her. It’s good material. I love the fact that it has a zipper in the upper back and the buttons in the bottom. It’s so easy for it to come off dry or wet. Provides sun protection. Highly recommend. It’s the second set I got her. Bought a pair when she was a 12-18mo and now 3T. Will continue to buy in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Claudia Villalobos

customer_reviews.title: This suit is so great, I am reordering it!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this suit sixteen months ago and I am back to buy the same suit in a larger size. It is well made and durable. The long sleeves mean less time and trouble wrangling a toddler for sunscreen. The zippered back and snap crotch provide two options for getting the suit on and off. I appreciate not having to pull a wet suit up and over my daughter’s head to get her out of it. The snaps at the crotch also allow for quick and easy diaper changes. In addition to being super practical and comfortable, it is also really adorable. We get so many compliments on it!
customer_reviews.author: Randi L.

customer_reviews.title: Cute, functional, but not durable
customer_reviews.text: A very cute suit. I got my daughter the 12-18 month size and it fit just a little baggy on her at 5 months. She's a little larger than the average baby but not by much. I bought it with the intention of it lasting her all summer. Unfortunately on her first outing the bum area looked like the color rubbed away slightly from her sitting in the sand. It's not very bad but I expected it to hold up to sand for more than a few hours. I'd still recommend it for the cuteness and functionality.
customer_reviews.author: Aubri

customer_reviews.title: order 1 size up and it is PERFECT!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 10 month old daughter is in the 50th percentile for height and weight. I ordered the 12-18 month and it fits great, with a little room to grow. It is easy to get on with the zipper on the back, and it certainly has protected her skin from the sun (she burns easily). I love that I dont have to take her whole suit off to change her diaper either! The designs are so adorable too, and I got lots of compliments on it. I am ordering a 2nd one right now!
customer_reviews.author: Kristie

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for potty trained toddlers!
customer_reviews.text: My 24 month old is potty trained, so all the 2 piece 2T bottoms (when you buy 2 piece rash guard sets) we have are too big because they are made to be worn with swim diapers. This is a perfect solution! It keeps her covered, there's no messing with bottoms that are constantly sliding off, and it is easy to snap open to go to the bathroom. Plus, with the zipper, it's super easy to put on and take off. I'm probably buying another suit!
customer_reviews.author: CMTM

customer_reviews.title: Easier than applying sunscreen
customer_reviews.text: We love this swimsuit for our daughter! We don't have to go through the hassle of putting sunblock on and it provides great protection for the arms and upper body. Its super cute and provides good cover from the sun. We just spent a week on a house boat and this was used almost everyday. The material quality is good and is holding up well in the sun, water, sand, and repeating drying out and getting wet again.
customer_reviews.author: Boyce

customer_reviews.title: Awesome suit for baby
customer_reviews.text: Love it!! Fits a little small lengthwise. My baby was in 3m Carters and fit in the 6-12 month swimsuit. In 9m clothes she fits the 12-18 month swimsuit. It is very well made. Super cute. And the best part is the snaps at the bottom for diaper changes at the pool. The top of the back has a zipper that works well. Overall it’s just a convenient swimsuit. Like the long sleeves and we also have a short sleeve version that covers the shoulders
customer_reviews.author: CRB

customer_reviews.title: Buttons popped off after 3rd use :(
customer_reviews.text: The bathing suit is adorable BUT after my 12 month old has only worn it 3 times the buttons are popping off. Very dissappointed especially after what I paid for this item! I handwashef and hung to dry. Noticed a button was missing the last time she wore it and checked the others and saw they too were lose. I wish I could contact the seller to issue a replacement or a refund.
customer_reviews.author: ProudMommy

customer_reviews.title: Love these suits!
customer_reviews.text: Love love love these swimsuits. I bought one last year when my daughter was 9 months and again this Summer at 18 months. So many people comment on how adorable the suit is. And it's easy to get them on/off since there's a zipper and snaps (also easy for changing a diaper!). Someone put a lot of thought into the design and appearance of these suits. And they hold up so well. Not cheaply made.
customer_reviews.author: E.K. Irish

customer_reviews.title: So so cute!
customer_reviews.text: Super cute and great quality. PROS: lots of choices of cute patterns! Love the spf fabric and long sleeves to protect my babe. The zipper in the back makes it pretty easy to get on and off. Held up well after washing and seems well made. CONs: pretty expensive for a baby bathing suit. I think I spent not much more on my own bathing suit. I did size up so it would fit longer to make up for this, hopefully I’ll get two seasons out of it.
customer_reviews.author: C. Ward

customer_reviews.title: My opinion size up!!!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this suit. Super cute. I would definitely size up!! Our little one is 6 months old and she typically can wear 6 month clothes. For idea 6-9 month onesies from target are big on her. We ordered the suit in 12-18 months I’m glad we didn’t go any smaller!! It’s june and I need something to last her all summer and this size will work.
customer_reviews.author: Kendyl Maurer

customer_reviews.title: Love this bathing suit
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this bathing suit. My 1 year old daughter gets no sun through this bathing suit whatsoever. She's very fair skin so she would burn very easily. I ordered a size up so she could wear a Little Swimmer diaper with it and it fits perfect. She still has room to grow but its not baggy. I will definitely buy these bathing suits in the future for her
customer_reviews.author: ENehez

customer_reviews.title: Loved everything about it, but one of the snaps arrived defective.
customer_reviews.text: The first time I put this swimsuit on my toddler I was in love with the pattern and style. It is well made and has great potential EXCEPT one snap came bent. Since the snap was the outer snap it constantly looks like she has a saggy diaper and she constantly has one leg open. It’s so frustrating. She has only worn it once to ride in a boat, and that’ll probably be the last time she wears it, because I can tell it aggravates her as well. I really wish this would have worked better. For $30 I figured it would have held up better.
customer_reviews.author: BB34

customer_reviews.title: Spring for quality.
customer_reviews.text: Im pleasantly surprised on the high quality construction of the garment. We're starting swimming so I wanted sun protection and coverage, but still snaps for fast diaper changes. Check for snaps folks! Very few swimsuits have them. This had a cute design and had enough room to grow a little (bought 18m at the 13m mark and it's perfect)
customer_reviews.author: Skibum00572

customer_reviews.title: Great suit!
customer_reviews.text: Love this swimsuit. My girl was a preemie and barely weighs 16lbs at almost 11 months old. I bought the 6-12, it fits her great, and it's so cute. Couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Kcox

customer_reviews.title: VERY CUTE!!!
customer_reviews.text: I just received the bathing suit yesterday so we have not tried it out at the pool,beach or put in the sun yet. BUT!!! I tried it on her and it's super cute!!! And seems to be very comfortable!!! Fits her perfectly. I love the zip up in the back,and the 3 snaps it has for easy diaper changes!!! Can't wait to have her in it and using it!
customer_reviews.author: Mama Bear

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This swimsuit was perfect! My little one is a little on the small size, so the 3-6 month was a bit big for her even at 4 months, but that just gave her room to grow over the summer! The zipper in back & buttons on bottom make taking it on and off easy. Highly recommend! I would buy again when she outgrows this one.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: We love Ruffle Butts!!
customer_reviews.text: After receiving a ruffle butts bathing suit for my little girl as a gift last year, I HAD to order more this year! Super cute, didn’t rub her thighs, great sun protection, and she looked soooooo cute! We’ve gotten so many compliments! Aside from the quality and protection, my favorite part about this suit is the snaps at the bottom, made it so convenient to change her in a wet suit rather than taking it off! You definitely get your money’s worth! I do recommend sizing up after reading the reviews and doing the same. She wears a 12-18 normally, but I decided to go with the 18-24, super happy I did!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Cute and easy to use! Wears out fast
customer_reviews.text: I love this suit! So easy to take on and off, and less surface area to apply sunscreen! Plus its just so cute, I get so many compliments. The picture doesn't do it justice, it's adorable! Update: These bathing suits wear out so fast! I think that they just aren’t made for consistent use. My kids have swim lessons weekly in a pool plus swimming in between. They just faded and thinned out super quickly. They provided me with a hand wash routine which perhaps If I had followed it maybe they would last longer. But I wasn’t looking for a delicate suit, so these just won’t be for me in the future. Great customer service though.
customer_reviews.author: debimustard

customer_reviews.title: This is the perfect baby swim suit for the summer!
customer_reviews.text: This suit will be perfect for the summer! The prints colors are even more beautiful in person and the ruffles on the butt make it even more adorable on a little girl! It is well stitched and very true to size. My 9mo baby is wearing average 12 mo size. I ordered her the 12-18 mo and this suit fits comfortably with room for her to still grow into.
customer_reviews.author: LMS

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous but poorly made
customer_reviews.text: This has to be one of the cutest bathing suits my daughter has ever had, but after only a couple uses, two of the three buttons have fallen off! It’s infuriating because everything else about it is perfect. I’ve tried to safety pin it, and it works, but this should not happen on an expensive bathing suit. I’m out of my return window so I’m out of luck. Just be careful when undoing buttons when it’s wet.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay Young

customer_reviews.title: Yes Yes Yes
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely LOVE this bathing suit. Long-sleeved for sun protection, yet super easy to put on (just slides right on my babies little arms with no struggles). Only complaint is there is no snap to prevent the zipper from popping up on the back of her neck. Other than that, it's perfect. Highly recommend. Fits true to size. Baby is 13lbs. and 26" long. 3-6 month size is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: shelley

customer_reviews.title: Easy to get on and ships quickly
customer_reviews.text: This was super cute when it arrived. Baby’s mom adored it as the colors are lovely. Frabric and design are way more lux than expected for the price. We had a traditional swim shirt and it was a nightmare getting on and off. After seeing RuffleButts on line I was super excited to try it. When you live in Florida you have mucho swim time. The zip back and snap bottom makes it easy to get a baby in and out for lunch, hang dry for nap time and it’s ready for an afternoon swim. Perfect, perfect, perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Tracey Mallow

customer_reviews.title: Ruffles not well made; already falling off after minimal use.
customer_reviews.text: Super cute but she's only worn it about 8 times and the ruffles are already falling off. She only wears it for about an hour at a time and doesn't even sit down in it so I'm not sure why it's already falling apart. I hand wash this in the sink with Woolite so it's never been through the washing machine.
customer_reviews.author: botanicazilla

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THESE SWIMSUITS!
customer_reviews.text: I have bought ruffle bum swimsuits before for my daughter and we absolutely love this brand! We have gotten so many complements on her swimsuits and I can’t wait for the weather to be nice to start swimming with her again! I would highly recommend these swim suit. I wanted something that would protect my wee one from the sun While also looking so adorable
customer_reviews.author: Kira Mahovlich

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality!
customer_reviews.text: The quality is excellent! I wanted a swim suit that would provide plenty of coverage for my baby, SPF, the snap for diaper changes is an awesome feature. The colors of the suit are vibrant and beautiful. The ruffles on the back are so cute. I got the Painted Flowers Design. I was concerned if the suit would fit my child. She’s 7 months, 13 lbs, and 25 inches. She was a premie so clothing sizes this small are for age which makes it difficult. The suit fits great and she has plenty of room to grow into it without it looking baggy. Will definitely recommend and buy from this company again.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Cute, well made and easy on and off
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bathing suit for my 7 month old (27.5”, 17 lbs 11 oz) for a vacation in FL and it fits perfectly with a little room to grow. The print, bows and ruffles are adorable and the UPF protected her delicate skin from the strong FL sun, no sunblock needed. The suit is easy to get in and off because of the zipper at the back and snap crotch, which also makes diaper changes fast and easy. Why don’t all baby bathing suits have this?! I washed the suit in the washing machine on a gentle cycle when we got home and it came out perfectly. So happy with this purchase, I’ll be buying more for the summer.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine

customer_reviews.title: Love this swimsuit
customer_reviews.text: Super cute swim suit. I LOVE that it offers UV protection for littles and I don’t need to use as much sun screen (we got a long sleeved one!). The snaps for diapers is nice— although this ended up being a function we didn’t need since we potty trained at 20 mos. It did make for quick and easy access to go potty though.
customer_reviews.author: andrew smith

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: So adorable and great quality! Fit as expected. 12-18 month fits my soon to be 12 month old perfect and should last most of the summer. For reference she is on the petite side at 28" and just under 20lb. A taller baby would probably benefit going up 1 size. She still wears 6-9 month clothes.
customer_reviews.author: Vinjari1990

customer_reviews.title: Fits well and cute! Daughter loves the material
customer_reviews.text: This fits my 21 month old daughter that weighs about 27 pounds (size 2T). It fits but it is not super tight so she has room to grow during the summer and it will continue to fit. The arm length is perfect for her. She has not gone swimming in it yet but when she tried it on she loves the material and did not want to take it off. We like it!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Too large for my baby super cute though
customer_reviews.text: Great quality a little not too thick my daughter would overheat in this it was too big for her we returned it but I did find one with built in reusable swim diaper which makes life so much easier I hope ruffle butts start putting built in diapers in theirs makes life so much easier
customer_reviews.author: seif

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I get one of these suits for my daughter every year, but this year I was disappointed. We haven’t worn it very much and one of the snaps came off. I will be contacting customer service when they open and will update my review after I speak with someone.
customer_reviews.author: phmomof4

customer_reviews.title: The absolute best baby bathing suit!
customer_reviews.text: These are basically the only bath suits we buy anymore. Our baby has very fair skin it's she burns so easily in the sun. It's really hard to find long sleeve SPF bathing suits that unbutton at the bottom for an easy change. Somebody was FINALLY thinking when they made these! Great product worth the extra few bucks $ compared to other suits.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Andrew Mayer

customer_reviews.title: It wasn't RuffleButts
customer_reviews.text: Completely wrong product.. I got false lashes and a wig thing in a really sketchy looking package that was pink and torn and said rufflebutts on it. I ordered a couple of swimsuits straight from the RuffleButts website and they are gorgeous and fit my baby perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Claire Sperry-Sutfin

customer_reviews.title: Worth every $$
customer_reviews.text: This bathing suit is exceptionally well made! The attention to detail is fabulous the stitching is wonderful. Very very impressed with the swimsuit. My child is around the size of a 6 month old and I bought a 6 to 12 month bathing suit I believe she will grow out of it by 8 months however as it definitely runs true to the smallest size. Will be purchasing many many more as these are so incredibly cute and again so very well made!!!! I only wish mine were made this well
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Swimsuit
customer_reviews.text: This swimsuit is perfect! It is very cute, and very well made. The zipper in the back makes it very easy to put on, and the snaps on the bottom are perfect for diaper changes. I bought the 6-12 month size for my 6 month old who is 26.5 inches long and 18 pounds. The suit fits, with a bit of room to grow. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Stacy K

customer_reviews.title: Super cute!
customer_reviews.text: This is the only brand that I could find with as small as 0-3 month size. It's the cutest, and I got so many compliments on how cute it is! Hopefully we get to use it more, but if not, I'll have to try for another girl so I can! It's super, super cute.
customer_reviews.author: MomOf7Top Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Received so many compliments!
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited about this swimsuit and was very pleased when receiving it! It looked so cute on our daughter. The fit was great which I was a little worried about but wasnt to tight or to baggy. However my daughter is almost 3 months and is about 9 lbs. I loves the way it looked and we got so many compliments! I plan to buy another print for vacation!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Must have for baby girls
customer_reviews.text: This swimsuit is awesome. My granddaughter was 4 months old when she first wore this suit and is still wearing it a 6 months. It is great because it snaps underneath and also has a zipper in the back. It protects her, and is a beautiful suit as well.
customer_reviews.author: AJS

customer_reviews.title: Cute and comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: Super cute and made with quality material. I bought it for my two week old baby, and it gives her the protection from the sun, easy to take on and off, and super easy to change her diaper while wearing it. Lots of compliments from other because the pattern and ruffle butt is so cute!
customer_reviews.author: T Swaim

customer_reviews.title: Pretty colors and great fit!
customer_reviews.text: We LOVE LOVE this swimsuit. The snaps at the bottom make it easy for mom and dad to change diapers and the back zipper makes it super easy to get our little wiggle worm dressed quickly. The colors are beautiful and we get A LOT of compliments. Oh and did I mention that we LOVE the long sleeves?!? We will definitely make RuffleButts our go to for our little girl's swimwear in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super cute and priced competitively
customer_reviews.text: Super cute! She hasn't worn it yet, but it's really cute, love the long sleeves & ruffles and the snaps for diaperchanges or ease of on off. That's something other suits don't have. It's competitively priced for a long sleeve SPF rashguard/swimsuit. I can't wait to see her in it this summer. Add: sizing is accurate, 2T. Easy on & off. Doesn't fade after washing.
customer_reviews.author: Dianne DeKoning

customer_reviews.title: Very well made.
customer_reviews.text: Yesterday Lily wore hers to the Marriott pool and was voted cutest ruffle butt in the entire pool area! (Her sister is saving her debut for San Diego!) I also think, beyond being adorable they are very well made. The sun protection will be especially nice at San Diego beaches.
customer_reviews.author: FLincavage@aol.com

customer_reviews.title: Perfect swim suit
customer_reviews.text: I needed a quick swimsuit for my girls because store around us have been closed so I picked this swim suit because it had the quickest delivery and boy am I happy with them. The quality of the material is so much better than I expected and I know it will last all summer, the fit is perfect, I got 12/18 month for my 10 month old who’s 19 pounds and 28 inches and 2T for my 2 year old who’s 24 pounds and 36 inches. Also they are super cute, the pictures don’t do it justice. I’m so excited to have my girls in the pool and not have to worry about their shoulders or arms.
customer_reviews.author: Lacie Horvath

customer_reviews.title: Super cute and baby loves
customer_reviews.text: My baby daughter coos and caas when I grab the suit to put her in it. It's so cute, love the ruffle butt. Easy to get her in and out of and seems like nice material. It was worth spending a little more for the style and quality.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Great quality suit
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful swimsuit love the print and the quality it top of the line! It does run small my daughter is 4 and a half months. 24 1/2 in long and 13 #s I ordered the 6-12 month and it fits just right. However i think she’s going to outgrow it before the summer is over. And for 30$ I don’t want to buy another suit to get through the summer. So I ordered the 12-18 month and it’s big sleeves are pretty long and she has so extra room in the length now.
customer_reviews.author: Constance

customer_reviews.title: Super cute swimsuit, disappointed over one thing
customer_reviews.text: Supper bummed! I got this suit probably back in April? May? It was a bit more than I wanted to spend in a toddler bathing suit, but it's adorable! Obviously since it's been nicer daughter has been wearing it more. Today one of the snaps broke off! She can still wear the suit, but spending $30 I would hope it would hold out til the end of summer.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Runs small, but great quality and very cute!
customer_reviews.text: Love rufflebutt swimsuits! So cute and the quality is obvious. They do run small though. My daughter is 2y 3mo old, she fits into 24mo clothes nicely right now. Since I have had a rufflebutt swimsuit for her before I knew to size up. I bought a 3T and it fits well with some room to grow!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Adorable and Highly Recommended
customer_reviews.text: The material was silky and felt breathable. It was about as easy to put on as just about anything else is on a 2.5 month old baby. At first I thought it was a little small and wouldn't fit but it ended up fitting like another layer of her skin as a swimsuit should. Did I mention the ruffle butt was precious??
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Dunn

customer_reviews.title: Crotch Snaps Are Shoddily Applied
customer_reviews.text: Was thrilled to purchase this bathing suit for my now 9 mo old granddaughter, 6-12 mo size. I do all my daughter's laundry; this suit had its 4th washing in a lingerie bag, being dried on a hanger, and this. No snap works; they weren't sewn in. Never any strain on the suit anywhere, my granddaughter is petite at 26 in and 16#. Very disappointed, especially considering the amount I paid for this suit.
customer_reviews.author: Suzi

customer_reviews.title: Best suit with sleeves I have found yet!
customer_reviews.text: It is so hard to find a cute swim suit with long sleeves but this one is adorable. The pattern looks even better in person and the ruffle bottom is so cute. It runs just a little on the small side so I would prefer a size up if I were to order again. Overall, the fabric and stitching seems to be of good quality and the suit keeps my daughter much warmer in the pool during her swim lessons.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So cute, BUT right around thighs
customer_reviews.text: Fit my 21 month old for 2 months. By the time she was 2 it was too thought around her thighs. She’s 29lbs and taller. She does have cute chunky baby thighs but not out of normal. The bows on the sides should be adjustable.
customer_reviews.author: Todd

customer_reviews.title: Fell apart at the crotch second time worn
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased (size 3T) as a birthday present for my 3-year old niece whose birthday was in March. She lives in the northeast, so has only been able to wear it very recently. It's a nice looking (and seemingly perfect) swimsuit for a toddler BUT the snaps at the crotch pulled apart from the fabric on the second wearing, and it is now past the window for return. The child is small for her age, so it was not an issue of her having outgrown the suit. Very disappointed, especially since my niece was very excited about the flamingo pattern.
customer_reviews.author: Joanne

customer_reviews.title: Snaps fell off
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a size up and it fit my baby perfectly! It was super cute and we got alot of compliments, but sadly, she only got to wear it 3 or 4 times, because one of the snaps in the crotch fell off. I am very disappointed in the quality for the price I paid.
customer_reviews.author: Lana Walker

customer_reviews.title: Quality with the price
customer_reviews.text: Love it and I purposely got it a size up so my little 2 yr old will use it for next summer hopefully. She is a bit smaller than normal 2 yr old. Yes it is pricy but worth it especially because it’s long sleeve and has a zipper to adjust to head so that it continues to fit as she grows. Finally it has buttons on bottom so that she can easily go to restroom without me having to completely take it all off.
customer_reviews.author: Diana Pak

customer_reviews.title: Buy it ♥️♥️♥️
customer_reviews.text: This bathing suit is so freakin cute! Fits great, easy on and off, and the quality is amazing! My only regret is not buying it in a bigger size, only because my baby is just growing so fast! You will not regret buying this suit!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Adorable but sand gets stuck!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love how adorable this bathing suit is. The quality seems good but the sand gets stuck in the fabric pretty badly. Even after washing it, it’s noticeable. I really feel as though that shouldn’t happen after spending thirty dollars on this. Also, after washing just once the coloring fades so much that it looks like we’ve had it for a couple years. I’m overall disappointed about this bathing suit.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: SO CUTE!!! 💖
customer_reviews.text: This is a gift I have yet to give. So I don’t really know the fit because I chose a size they will grow into. It is beautiful and so cute. Made really well. I received my order quicker than I expected. So thank you!
customer_reviews.author: joyful

customer_reviews.title: Adorable Baby’s Bathing Suit
customer_reviews.text: The bathing suit was used to go outside and enjoy in a little kiddie pool. Easy to get into and out of. Cute little ruffle on butt hence the name. I bought a 9-12 month size. My granddaughter is 12 months old, 24” tall and weighs 20 lbs. She has a room to grow but it is not droopy. A waterproof diaper was used underneath suit. I believe this will last through the summer for her.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So Adorable
customer_reviews.text: Very cute swim suit. My baby is 8mo and around 18lbs. She is very little for her age. She wears 6mo clothing so I purchased the 3-6mo size and fit perfect. I probably should have bought the next size up. It has buttons to change diaper easy. Material is nylon feel so dries fast. Hat is super cute from SNW kid baby summer hat on amazon.
customer_reviews.author: TanyaTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: I’m LOVE!!
customer_reviews.text: This is my first ever suit with ruffle butts (we have a few hats) IM IN LOVE with the print! My little girl is a red head and the colors go amazing with her red hair and blue eyes! She is 6mo but is pretty big for her age (long and chubby) so I went with an 18-24mo suit. Sleeves are a tad long So I roll them once but other than that it’s awesome! It’ll most definitely last her through the entire summer AND I will be buying only Rufflebutts suits from now on!
customer_reviews.author: Jordyn Williams

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this swimsuit! Got a 18-24 month size for my 27 lb eleven month old and it fits great with some room to grow. Love the ability to change diapers quickly and easily. Bought another in a different design. Def recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: Stop looking and buy this suit. It is beautiful and fits my little one perfectly. I looked everywhere to find the bottoms snaps and rash guard. It’s a little expensive for a suit she’ll only wear one season but it’s worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Mary K

customer_reviews.title: Protects my little AND so so cute!
customer_reviews.text: I only took the star off because two of the three snaps in the diaper area came off within the first two months, HOWEVER- I absolutely will purchase from this company again because the material is definitely quality, the cut and designs are super cute, and they provided excellent customer service with a quick replacement for me. They stand behind the quality of their product and that means a LOT to me! I love the lightweight sun protection this gives my little one!
customer_reviews.author: caroline roberts

customer_reviews.title: Faded immediately
customer_reviews.text: It was a super cute pattern and love the easy on/off with the zipper back and snaps. BUT- one dip in the pool and the pattern completely bleached out. The suit is now a very, very pale peach and gray-ish.
customer_reviews.author: Shawna Wecht

customer_reviews.title: very convenient
customer_reviews.text: Love this swimsuit! It is super handy to be one piece and have the snaps! Well worth getting! My only complaint is the sizing, our daughter is long and skinny and this seems to be sized for babies who are fuller so its a little wide through the midsection and a little short in the sleeves which isnt a real big deal.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, awesome sun protection!
customer_reviews.text: I love the colors of this suit. It’s even more beautiful than the pictures show. It has held up well all summer and hasn’t faded or balled up at all! We’ve swam a lot this summer and usually by now her suit is worn out. (She’s an active toddler!) I’m hoping by buying it a bit big she can wear it again next summer too! The sun protection makes it easy to be very fair skinned and still spend lots of time in the sun. I would 100% recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa S.

customer_reviews.title: Great suit. May want to size up.
customer_reviews.text: I've bought 2 of these suits. Great quality. You many want to size up. I have a small toddler. 18 months, 21 lbs and 32 inches tall. It fits perfect. Not much room to grow though.
customer_reviews.author: chad shoemake

customer_reviews.title: Adorable and functional
customer_reviews.text: Does run a tad small but it seems most swimwear for babies and toddlers do. My little one is 18lbs at 11 months. We got the 12-18 month suite and it fits perfectly. If you have a chunkier baby I definitely recommend sizing up. Otherwise the crotch snaps and back zipper make this so much less of a headache than most swimwear.
customer_reviews.author: Ag16

customer_reviews.title: Great buy, very cute
customer_reviews.text: I really like these swimsuits. This is the third of the brand I’ve bought, just this time for my youngest in a size we didn’t have. I love how much it covers her body, I love the fabric pattern, and I think the design with the ruffles is just too cute. Looking forward to a summer with lots of use.
customer_reviews.author: DyerFam

customer_reviews.title: My absolute favorite bathing suit!!!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this bathing suit! My daughter wore this all summer and it has lasted through the beach, pools, and multiple washes! The long sleeves help protect her from the sun and I love the pattern, ruffles and bows. We have gotten soo many compliments on it everywhere we go! We bought the 12-18 month size in February when my daughter was 12 months for a trip to Florida and it still fits very well now that she is almost 18 months.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great swimsuit! I will be purchasing more as my daughter grows!
customer_reviews.text: This bathing suit is perfect and super cute! My daughter is on the smaller side and so I was concerned that it wouldn’t fit snug enough. It fits perfectly. Just enough room so that I can get her in it without feeling like she will be stuck. This suit will last her throughout the summer and into the fall The material is nice and soft. The design is super classy and cute. Overall the suit is well constructed. I really enjoy the snaps at the bottom( it’s like a onesie). Very convenient for diaper changes!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, quality , sun protection
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful quality material!! Love the added UV protection. My daughter is 9 months and wears 12 month clothing - I ordered the 18-24 month size and it fits with some room to grow. Absolutely adorable suit and quality for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Cait Tramontozzi

customer_reviews.title: Will buy again for the next size
customer_reviews.text: Adorable! Perfect for my newborn baby that weighs 8 pounds. Very soft and thick to protect her from the sun. Love that it also snaps on the bottom like a onesie to easily change her diaper
customer_reviews.author: Chastity McMahan

customer_reviews.title: Great Fit & Quality - also cute!
customer_reviews.text: love the zipper and snap center for easy diaper changes. I LOVE that the suit doesn't ride when shes playing and I dont need to worry about her tummy/lower back being exposed to the sun. Daughter is 15mo (25lbs and 33in tall) and I ordered a 2T. Room to grow but not overly snug.
customer_reviews.author: Cayla Mosser

customer_reviews.title: Small
customer_reviews.text: Super cute and well made however runs very small. Per the review saying do I order a 12 month size for my average sized 6 month old and we will probably only get about 2 wears out if it. It’s very small.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Thomley

customer_reviews.title: Adorable!
customer_reviews.text: So cute! Love that there are snaps on the bottom to make for easy diaper changes. Zipper in the back makes it easy to put on and take off, too. - a plus when the suit is wet. Needed the rash guard for our little love. Will be perfect for boating this summer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love the bottom snaps!
customer_reviews.text: Adorable! I love having a one piece long sleeves that you can unbutton the bottom to change (so convenient)! Baby/toddler swim suits always run small in my opinion or they are too tight to get the arms through, so I usually size up from clothes sizes. 18-24 suit for 20 month old (22lbs, wearing 12-18 mo clothes).
customer_reviews.author: Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Snaps Pulled Out
customer_reviews.text: I loved this bathing suit because of the snaps at the bottom. My granddaughter wears a swim diaper, so it makes access so much easier. However, We are now into the swim season (I purchased this bathing suit in December as a Christmas gift) and in three weeks the snaps are pulling out. The suit is adorable, but the snaps will not hold up to the wear and tear of a toddler. :(
customer_reviews.author: S Templeton

customer_reviews.title: Best swim suit for babies/toddlers
customer_reviews.text: Loves these suits! We had received one as a gift and bought this one. They have held up to many pool and beach trips this summer. (We machine wash and hang dry) I especially love the bottom snaps and back zipper- super easy to take off!
customer_reviews.author: Jenna Orlando

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and beautiful suit!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve purchased so many suits for my 4 month old daughter and this is by far the nicest one to date! It zips in the back and also buttons at the crotch for easy diaper changes. The fabric is great quality and it’s extremely well made. She’s a long baby so it’s been really hard to find anything that fits her.
customer_reviews.author: JGermonp220

customer_reviews.title: Adorable and functional..win win!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love everything about this suit! Great sun protection, quality, fit, and adorable style. Love that it snaps at the crotch for easy diaper change and back zipper makes for easy on and off of a squirmy toddler, even when wet. Our little girl got lots of compliments on this one. Highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Adorable
customer_reviews.text: Runs a bit small so we sized up to make sure our petite girl could wear it through the summer. She received so many compliments at the pool. We love that it gives her sun protection without slathering her with sunscreen. We paired this with light pink swim pants from Coolibar.
customer_reviews.author: Stimwalt

product_meta.title: RuffleButts Baby/Toddler Girls UPF 50+ Sun Protection Long Sleeve One Piece Swimsuit with Zipper
feature_bullets: ADORABLE DESIGN - Features the sweetest details for stylish sun safety. One-piece design and long sleeves offer full coverage and comfort along with greater flexibility while your little girl grows. And, our signature ruffles are on every pair of bottoms.

BUILT-IN SUN PROTECTION - No more tears! Keep your little girl's delicate skin safe in the sun with RuffleButts features built-in UPF 50+ so there's more playing and less worrying about harsh UV rays. Perfect for the beach, lake or pool!

QUICK CHANGE SNAPS and ZIPPER - Diapers changes are a breeze with 3 nickel-free snaps at the bottom and a convenient zipper at the neck/back makes getting this suit on / off a no-more-tears experience.

HAPPINESS GUARANTEE - We want our customers to be completely happy! That's why we offer a 100% Happiness Guarantee: if you're not fully satisfied with your purchase, our customer support will make it right.

QUALITY FIRST - Designed in the USA, our garments are made of high-quality fabric that's fade-resistant and durable while still feeling soft and comfortable. Just hand wash in cold water, then dry flat for play day after play day.
